name: Creepies - Jolly Jack-Os Chancies bauble
description:
Look deep inside your Christmas tree,
And if you're lucky you will see
A Jolly Jack-O smiling at you,
They're a present for the Christmas tree... as well as for you.

Please note that this listing is for a Chancie, you will not be receiving the exact Jolly Jack-Os pictured.

Creepies are creepy creations, hand-made from polymer clay by Mrs. Creepy at creepy corner. Each Creepy comes lovingly packaged with a Creepies sticker and other creepy goodies.

Please note that Creepies are for decoration only and are NOT toys

www.facebook.com/creepy.creations

Art is copyright © Creepies 2013
Please visit my shop: www.creepies.co.uk
The purchase does not give buyer reproduction rights of any kind.

GIFT BOXES NOW AVAILABLE - www.etsy.com/uk/listing/163213094/creepies-gift-box

name: Creepies - Chancies
description:
Take a chance on a chancie - They're as odd as can be, Which one will you get? You'll have to wait and see. See which one you want, from the drop down list, There's so many to choose from, you wont be able to resist!





Creepies are creepy creations, hand-made from polymer clay by Mrs. Creepy at creepy corner. Each Creepy comes lovingly packaged with a Creepies sticker and other creepy goodies! GIFT BOXES NOW AVAILABLE - http://creepies.bigcartel.com/product/creepies-gift-box Pick which Creepy character you would like from the drop down menu for a random design of that character. Each character is numbered (Please note you will not be receiving that exact Creepie, you will be receiving a different creepy but of the same character) What makes each Creepy Chancie different? Colours, features, expressions, actions, props... there's no end! Please note that Creepies are for decoration only and are NOT toys. Please allow up to a max of 4 weeks for your Creepy to arrive (Maybe a little longer if you're outside of the UK) www.facebook.com/creepy.creations Art is copyright © Creepies 2013 Please visit my shop: www.creepies.co.uk The purchase does not give buyer reproduction rights of any kind. If you are wanting something specific please message me to set up a custom order.

name: Creepies Gift Box
description:
Buying a Creepy as a gift? Or just want a nifty way to display your Creepy?
We now offer gift boxes in black stuffed with shredded orange tissue paper.

Please note picture is for listing purposes, gift box will not include these Creepies and only one gift box per purchase.

Gift box is only available with purchase of a Creepy. Do not buy on own.
